summary: Header logo styling in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` was updated to render larger (h-10/w-10 mobile, sm:h-12/sm:w-12 desktop) with added background/ring/shadow for contrast, and the image source was changed to a new high-contrast asset path. However, the diff shows no new asset file added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, so the requested high-contrast logo file itself is not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create and use a higher-contrast variant of the existing generated logo asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it from `Header.tsx`.
missing_requirements.reason: `Header.tsx` now references `/assets/generated/platform-logo-high-contrast.dim_200x200.png`, but the diff shows no added files; therefore there is no evidence the new higher-contrast image asset actually exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
evidence: File diff summary shows "Added: 0" (no added files)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project tracking metadata in `project_state.json` (new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for frontend header logo visibility changes and optional new logo asset; it does not request modifications to project tracking/state files.
BuildRequest does not request changes to documentation/summary files; only the header logo and (if needed) an asset change were requested.
